column4: Anyone familiar with the System>Administration apps not launching? It says "Starting Administrative Application" in the task bar, but never prompts for password and it silently quits.
a recent botch in the compiz repos broke things like Synaptic, if that is what you mean
yeah, I had that issue at home... I'm not using the beerorkid repos here at the office though
try running the apps from the command line and seeing what errors are thrown
